title: The Lost Dutchman
description: The Lost Dutchman is a fictional story about two boys, Billy and Jacob, and their teacher, Mr. Martinez. While learning about the Gold Rush in Arizona in the late 1800s, something very odd happens. Suddenly, Billy finds himself, his friend, and his teacher searching for gold in the Superstition Mountains. Their adventure ends abruptly when Billy realizes he has been daydreaming. Or has he?
highFrequencyWords: ancient, binoculars, burro, canteen, cringed, emerged, exasperated, Gila monsters, hydrated, ideal, legendary, mesmerizing, portals, prospectors, rearranging, ridge, skeptics, stash, tattered, theories, veered, washes, whittling, willingly
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Punctuation                : Understand the use of quotation marks and commas in dialogue
awareness: Content Vocabulary                : Understand and use content vocabulary
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
